# IT - Course Project

This project is a functional platform focused on providing high-quality and free IT courses, as well as other educational content. It is part of the **Challenge 30github** initiative.

 <img  src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/144984605/413273851-347f2a17-cc77-42e2-a0c9-9785897b8205.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3Mzk1Mjk5NzMsIm5iZiI6MTczOTUyOTY3MywicGF0aCI6Ii8xNDQ5ODQ2MDUvNDEzMjczODUxLTM0N2YyYTE3LWNjNzctNDJlMi1hMGM5LTk3ODU4OTdiODIwNS5wbmc_.ZE4KWWey1T4Bu-3bXMFbTSZRB7iHu-2yjyPjzLcbq2k" 
/>



## Key Features:
- 📚 **Browse & Filter Courses**
- 💳 **Purchase Courses with Stripe**
- 📈 **Track Progress for Each Course**
- 🖥️ **Student Dashboard**
- 🎓 **Teacher Mode**
- 🔄 **Easily reorder chapter positions with drag and drop**
- ➕ **Create New Courses and Chapters**
- 📤 **Upload Thumbnails, Attachments, and Videos with UploadThing**
- 🎥 **Secure HLS Video Player using Mux**
- ✍️ **Rich Text Editor for Chapter Descriptions**
